title: Weapon poison++ (unf)

properties.value: A Weapon poison++ (unf) is an unfinished potion made via the Herblore skill by using a cave nightshade on a vial of coconut milk.

A Weapon poison++ (unf) is an unfinished potion made via the Herblore skill by using a cave nightshade on a vial of coconut milk.

It is used to make the Weapon poison++ at level 82 by adding poison ivy berries, earning 190 experience.

A '''Weapon poison++ (unf)''' is an unfinished potion made via the [[Herblore]] skill by using a [[cave nightshade]] on a vial of [[coconut milk]].

It is used to make the [[Weapon poison++]] at level 82 by adding [[poison ivy berries]], earning 190 [[experience]].
